_header: If I lie backbite or steal / If I curse scorn or swear
Subjects: children, instructions for the behaviour of
_description: A lesson to be kept in mind by a virtuous child — eighteen lines in couplets

BodRawPoe32.First Lines:
If I backbyte lye or steleIf I curse Skorne or
                    swere…
BodRawPoe32.Last Lines:
…Assaile me well for CheriteAnd then shall I þe better
                    be
